overview: SHE created the world, from the smallest grain of sand to the tallest mountain, from the smallest goblin to the grand drake. But, if SHE falls all her creations will be changed and none can tell if for better or for worse. Few vessels will be chosen to carry the spark of change and their lives will be bound forever. This is where the tale begins...  Come explore Season 1 of the sinful fantasy world of Fixxxion. A warrior princess finds herself alone and on the run after her father, the king, is assassinated by his own guard.
title: Fixxxion
